attributes.action: Give Gurkhas the same pension benefits as British military personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our government financially supports people in our own society who refuse to work or contribute, yet these soldiers from a distant land have fought and died for us for nearly 200 years and are treated with ingratitude and neglect. They deserve the same pension rights as a British soldier.  Please help them achieve this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
